description.value:
You conjure up a &Reference[sphere]{sphere} of water with a 5-foot radius at a point you can see within range. The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} can hover but no more than 10 feet off the ground. The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} remains for the spell’s duration.

Any creature in the sphere’s space must make a &Reference[str]{Strength} saving throw. On a successful save, a creature is ejected from that space to the nearest unoccupied space of the creature’s choice outside the &Reference[sphere]{sphere}. A Huge or larger creature succeeds on the saving throw automatically, and a Large or smaller creature can choose to fail it. On a failed save, a creature is &Reference[restrained]{restrained} by the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} and is engulfed by the water. At the end of each of its turns, a &Reference[restrained]{restrained} target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} can restrain as many as four Medium or smaller creatures or one Large creature. If the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} restrains a creature that causes it to exceed this capacity, a random creature that was already &Reference[restrained]{restrained} by the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} falls out of it and lands &Reference[prone]{prone} in a space within 5 feet of it.

As an action, you can move the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} up to 30 feet in a straight &Reference[line]{line}. If it moves over a pit, a cliff, or other drop-off, it safely descends until it is hovering 10 feet above the ground. Any creature &Reference[restrained]{restrained} by the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} moves with it. You can ram the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} into creatures, forcing them to make the saving throw.

When the spell ends, the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} falls to the ground and extinguishes all normal flames within 30 feet of it. Any creature &Reference[restrained]{restrained} by the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} is knocked &Reference[prone]{prone} in the space where it falls. The water then vanishes.
